attributes.action: Force Oil companies to pass on the reductions of oil prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Oil has fell in cost by almost one third (almost $150 a barrel in July and now less than $90) yet the British motorist has seen a reduction of less than 10p per litre. The government is pushing for those who can afford to have savings to be protected, but what about the rest of us? Is the government taking advantage of the tax they are getting from petrol to protect the wealthy of this country?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
